title: My entire friends list was deleted
body: Logged in today and I had 0/0 Friends, I added all the Facebook recommended back immediately, and those that are in my groups, However I am still missing all the friends I have obtained since being on the OCE server. Pls help mi <3

replies.body:
Hi,

I noticed a similar thing with my list just now - but it was fixed after I logged out and logged back in.

Can you give that a try and let me know if it is still an issue?

Cheers
Mindstar
Thanks for your responses folks- we are looking into it.

Happened to both my friends. :< (sad I only have 2 friends)
I'm able to see them but they can't see me unless I message them. A bit weird.

Same thing here, although last time this issue occurred (last week?) I was still appearing online from my friends POV. It seems to be affected both ways this time, as I'm receiving friend invites from people I had previously added, and relogging hasn't solved the issue like it did previously.
I have tried logging several times and it still hasn't come back. The only friend I have online is one that re-added me earlier.
I did Try relogging  twice, but still no original friends list, I do believe they might be able to see me.

**Mindstar **has posted an announcement here in case your issue is still ongoing:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/B41QTqBZ-1542016-friends-list-chat-issues

> **_UPDATE 22:30_
> We've made some fixes to our servers that should hopefully resolve the issue. Let us know if it is fixed!**
> 
> Original Post
> 
> Hi folks,
> 
> We're aware of some issues with the chat system which are causing player's friends lists to not display correctly or at all.
> 
> We're working on it now so stay tuned for updates.
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar
